property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a control check is made, that check gets -1. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent takes the top card of their deck and adds it to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before a control check is made, that check gets +2. R Commit: After your opponent adds a card to their momentum, take the top card of your deck and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent deals 2 or less damage, they take 1 card from their discard pile and add it to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 2 momentum: Take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your momentum. Your opponent discards 1 random face down momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Take All the attacks in your card pool and add them to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum. E Discard 2 momentum: Destroy any asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent takes the top card of their deck and adds it to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent's next control check this turn gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is blocked, it gets -6 damage. Your opponent discards All of their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent may not play responses for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, the control check for that block gets -X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: For the rest of this attack's enhance step, any control checks you make while playing responses get +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, the control check for that block gets -1. Take the top card of your deck and add it to your card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. If you have more momentum than your opponent, X equals the difference in momentum. If you don't have more momentum, X equals 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a control check is made, that check gets either +1 or -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If any attack deals damage, your opponent may not add cards to their momentum during this turn's End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: All control checks get -1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Control checks may not be modified by card abilities for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you make a control check, discard the top card of your opponent's deck. Use the discarded card's control instead of discarding the top card of your deck. Only playable during your opponent's turn. F Commit: Your opponent reveals their hand and discards All asset and action cards revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you discard cards from your hand due to a card effect, your opponent discards 2 cards. E: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 2 foundations: Destroy any asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After a control check is made, that check gets +2. If this makes it greater than or equal to the difficulty of the check then it is now successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before a control check is made, that check gets +1. E: Change the attack zone of your attack played as a Reversal to high or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +2 damage unless your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed unless your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage and was played as a Reversal, you and your opponent each discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, the control check for that block gets +1. E: Commit 1 foundation: Take an attack played as a Reversal from your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage for each card your opponent has discarded this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 3 cards: Your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card. Only playable if the attack just played has higher damage than speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent discards cards from their hand, they discard 1 card. Only playable after they have discarded cards due to one of your card effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, you and your opponent each discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Punch attack gets +X damage. X equals your current vitality divided by 5 (rounded down). E: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 4 momentum: Your attack with difficulty 5 or more gets +4 damage. F: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum. Only playable once per turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you deal 3 or more damage with 1 attack, your opponent discards All face up cards in their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack played as a Reversal deals damage, your opponent loses vitality equal to the number of cards in their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack deals damage, the next attack you play this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If your attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +3 damage. F Commit: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your next punch attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If you have less momentum than your opponent, take cards from your discard pile and add them to your momentum until you have the same amount as your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation you control: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of cards in your hand divided by 2 (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next punch attack this turn gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difference between you and your opponent's momentum. Only playable if your opponent has more momentum than you.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the card before this one in your card pool is a punch attack, change the attack zone of this attack to high.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: The next punch attack you play this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next punch attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent takes the top card of their deck and adds it to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, your next punch attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your punch attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has a difficulty of 1 or less, play it following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After you play a card into your card pool, discard the card before it in your card pool. R: After you successfully block an attack, you may play a Reversal from your hand that does not share a resource symbol with All of the other cards in your card pool and your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you take damage from an attack, discard 2 cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Your opponent chooses 1 that you could play, following All restrictions and paying All costs. Play that card (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you have played your fourth card in a turn, take 1 {Water} card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Any attack gets -1 speed. R Commit: After you play a card with 0 difficulty, take any Reversal card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, play any card from your hand following All restrictions and paying All costs, progressive difficulty does not apply to playing this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards you have preceding this card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This card does not add to the difficulty of attacks that you play for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 speed. You may play this enhance twice per enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block with this card, the next attack you play this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, reveal a random face-down card from your momentum and play it following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, then All attacks get +1 speed for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have more cards in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool, this attack gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Discard 1 {Life} card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you play an attack as a Reversal, that attack gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 4 momentum: After your opponent takes damage from an attack equal to or greater than half that player's current vitality rounded up, that player loses the rest of their vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 character card: After you fail an attempt to block an attack, reduce that attack's damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and choose any number of these. Return the chosen cards to the top of your deck in any Order. Take any remaining cards and discard them.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: For the rest of the turn, after your opponent draws a card due to their card effect, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 2 foundations: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 3 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of resource symbols on the cards before this card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent takes 2 non-character cards from their staging area and adds them to their hand. Only playable if your opponent committed foundations due to this attack's Stun ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your next attack this turn is an {Air}, {Earth}, {Fire}, or {Water} attack, every number on that card are either increased by 2 or decreased by 2 (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: This attack gets 'Powerful: 1'. Only playable if you have dealt damage to your opponent this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, it gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, ready 1 foundation. You may not ready any more foundations this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. You may not play any more enhances this enhance step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a {Air}, {Earth}, {Fire}, {Void} or {Water} card, either discard 1 card from your card pool or discard 1 of your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum, discard 1 card: Take 1 foundation card from your discard pile and add it to your staging area ready. Only playable if you have fewer cards in your staging area than your opponent has in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, reveal your hand to your opponent: Either this attack gets +2 damage and you may change its zone to any other zone or your opponent reveals their hand and must commit 2 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you clear this card from your card pool, if it was played as a block, you may add it to your staging area instead of discarding it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you commit this foundation, you may ready 1 other foundation. You may not ready any more foundations this turn. You may play this ability while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card, discards 1 momentum, and destroys one of their assets. Only playable if you have more momentum then your opponent and more cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.
